events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection, resulting in damage to the vehicle's front bumper and airbags deployed.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the reported keywords and accident details provided by the customer.
A claims agent was assigned to the case to handle communication with the customer and oversee the claim process.
The customer was contacted and informed that the claim has been received and is being processed promptly.
Request sent to customer for police reports, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim.
Customer provided all requested documents including police report, photos of the collision damage, and workshop repair quotes.
Investigation into the accident details and submitted documents commenced to verify the claim circumstances and damages.
The investigation concluded that the accident was caused by the other vehicle running a red light, validating the customer's claim.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and inconvenience was proposed to the customer based on the investigation outcomes.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the amount offered.
The claim was officially approved by the claims department following customer acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for the approved claim settlement amount was issued to the customerâ€™s registered bank account promptly.
The claim case was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and customer acknowledgment of settlement completion.
All claim records, communications, and documents were archived securely as per company policy for future reference.
